snippet: Senator Marco Rubio of Florida is asserting his leadership among Republicans on immigration, previewing a proposal that includes measures to give legal status to millions of illegal immigrants.
abstract: Florida's Sen Marco Rubio is asserting his leadership among Republicans on overhauling immigration system, previewing a proposal that includes measures to give legal status to millions of illegal immigrants.
lead_paragraph: Senator Marco Rubio of Florida is asserting his leadership among Republicans on immigration, previewing a proposal that includes measures to give legal status to millions of illegal immigrants.

headline.seo: Marco Rubio Pushes Republican Party on Immigration Changes
headline.main: Rubio Pushes His Party on Immigration Changes
headline.print_headline: Rubio Pushes His Party On Immigration Changes
